fields.description: We continue to work to restore this database server. There is no further information to report at this time, but we will continue to update this issue periodically.

Most databases on the shared server have been successfully recovered. We continue to work on a very small number of problematic databases. We are discontinuing tracking of this issue since it affects a very small number of applications and will contact those customers directly with updates.
We are continuing to investigate poor performance in the platform.
We are continuing to monitor performance issues affecting some customers. We have made changes which should mitigate the problem for most customers and are continuing to monitor the situation.
